#NUMBER 4
```{r number4}
direction_vector <- c("East", "West", "North")
frequency_vector <- c(1, 4, 3)
factor_data <- factor(c(direction_vector, frequency_vector))
new_order_data <- factor(factor_data,levels = c("East","West","North"))
print(new_order_data)
```
